title: January Jones dons an edgy black leather dress while attending the InStyle Awards
text:
January Jones has some strong style while attending the fifth annual InStyle Awards on Monday evening.

The 41-year-old Mad Men actress looked daring in a chic black number when arriving to the exclusive party alongside some famous A-listers including Nina Dobrev, Jennifer Garner, Zendaya, and more.

As she headed in, she seemed to be having a blast as she flashed her big smile to the cameras while enjoying her evening.

She's In Style: January Jones has some strong style while attending the fifth annual InStyle Awards on Monday evening

Party time! As she headed in, she seemed to be having a blast as she flashed her big smile to the cameras while enjoying her evening

Her RODARTE dress was the epitome of edgy with a dramatic neckline with more ruffled detailing as well as ruffles along the skirt that made a high slit.

But the biggest detail in the number was the two large leather flowers that she had on both of her shoulders.

The leather designs were about size of bowling balls and made a large detailed flower as she smiled for photos.

Dramatic dress: Her RODARTE dress was the epitome of edgy with a dramatic neckline with more ruffled detailing as well as ruffles along the skirt that made a high slit

Lately, Jones has been keeping busy with her new Netflix original series Spinning Out.

The series was created by a former competitive figure skater which centers around former figure skater who has to quit her dreams when an unexpected circumstance happens.

January, who will play Carol Baker, plays the 'head of the Baker family' as she tries to help her two daughters become Olympians, according to Deadline.

Subtle look: The leather designs were about size of bowling balls and made a large detailed flower as she smiled for photos

The series, which is out on Netflix now, also stars Kaya Scodelario and Willow Shields.

Jones is most famously known for her role in Mad Men that earned her an Emmy nomination as well as two Golden Globe nominations.

Before her recent Netflix role, she starred in a movie on Fox called, The Last Man on Earth as well as another Netflix original, The Politician.
description: January Jones has some strong style while attending the fifth annual InStyle Awards on Monday evening. The 41-year-old Mad Men actress looked daring in a chic black number when arriving.
